archimate:Product.name: Guidelines
archimate:Product.documentation:
Guidelines for Adapting ADM process - applying iterations to the ADM - applying the ADM across the Architecture Landscape
Techiques for Architecture Development - architecture principles and patterns - interoperability requiremnts - stakeholder management - business scenarios - business transformation readiness assessment - gap analysis and risk management - capability-based planning and migration planning technieues
Using TOGAF with different architecture styles - secruity architecture and ADM ...
Hva er forskjellen mellom guidelines and techniques? -
